price: ហើយនៅថ្ងៃនោះ នរកជើហាន់ណាំត្រូវបានគេនាំមក។ នៅថ្ងៃនោះដែរ មនុស្សលោកនឹងភ្ញាក់រលឹក។ តើគេមានការភ្ញាក់ រលឹកយ៉ាងដូចមេ្ដច ?
arabic: وَجِاْيٓءَ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِجَهَنَّمَۚ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَتَذَكَّرُ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ ٱلذِّكۡرَىٰ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wajīa yawma-idhin bijahannama yawma-idhin yatadhakkaru al-insānu wa-annā lahu al-dhik'rā
